wallets.title: Wallets
wallets.content: Wallets display relevant information about your account balance status and transaction history. Here you can make replenishments and withdrawals of any of the presented currencies, buy and sell tokens, as well as make internal transfers to any of the existing accounts registered in the system.

invest.content: The investments tab provides information about the tariff plans offered by the company.You have the opportunity to invest in any of the three directions in each of which there are three tariff plans. There is no limit on the number of open tariff plans.
invest.withdrawal: Withdrawal after the termination of this tariff plan.

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.content: In the Portfolio, you can view all the information you are interested in about your working tariff plans, as well as view the history of accruals and replenishments, set the desired Autoreinvest value, use the Rebalancing and Reinvestment function.

calc.title: Calculator
calc.content: The profit calculator will help you calculate the daily accrual and profit for any selected tariff plan.
calc.Minimum_profit: Minimum profit for the whole period
calc.Maximum_profit: Maximum profit for the whole period

garant.title: Garant service
garant.content: Garant Service provides security in making joint deals within the company. You can request a deal from any partner of the company to open a joint tariff plan inside their cabinet. Your dividends and the transaction amount are automatically transferred to your wallet as soon as they are available for withdrawal.The services of the Garant Service apply only to PLATINUM tariffs.

partners.content: Here you can learn more about your structure, follow the development of your structural branches and partners.
partners.content2: For our partners, there is an affiliate program with the ability to receive tokens for inviting new partners, rewards for closing partner ranks and a fixed percentage daily payment depending on the rank and total structural profit. In total, there are 17 statuses that require a personal deposit determined by the company and the total turnover of the partner structure to be closed.

docs.title: DOCUMENTS
docs.content: Below are all the documents that the company provides.

1.title: What is an DTN token?
1.content: The DTN token is a universal internal currency of the company, which was created for the convenience of working inside the system. 1 OSMI token = $1 US.

2.title: Why do I need to verify my profile?
2.content: Investing in companies is only available to persons who have reached the age of majority.

3.title: How do I verify my profile?
3.content: In your Personal Account, open the 'SETTINGS'. Find the 'VERIFICATION' section and upload all the necessary documents.

4.title: What is the minimum amount to open a tariff plan?
4.content: The minimum amount for opening a deposit is 50 DTN tokens ($ 50 US).

5.title: How do I replenish my wallet?
5.content: In your personal account open 'WALLETS'. Choose a wallet depending on the currency or cryptocurrency that will be used for the replenishment. Specify the amount and the payment service. Follow the instructions of the selected payment service.

6.title: How do I buy/sell an DTN token ?
6.content: In your Personal Account open 'WALLETS'. Find an DTN wallet or another currency or cryptocurrency. Click 'BUY' and specify the amount and your other wallet from which the purchase will be made.

10.title: How long does it take to process replenishment and withdrawal requests?
10.content: In your personal account open 'WALLETS'. Exchange the DTN token for a currency or cryptocurrency that will be used to withdraw funds. Click on the 'WITHDRAW' button in the selected wallet. Specify the amount and the payment system.

11.title: How do I withdraw funds from my wallet?
11.content: In your personal account open 'WALLETS'. Exchange the DTN token for a currency or cryptocurrency that will be used to withdraw funds. Click on the 'WITHDRAW' button in the selected wallet. Specify the amount and the payment system.

12.title: Where can I change my account information?
12.content: In your personal account in the 'SETTINGS' section.
